Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia

Description: Saudi Arabian Mining Co (known as: MAADEN) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2008. MAADEN operates within the Materials sector focusing on Gold. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. MAADEN is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in March 1997.
